start: Welcome! Use /help to see available commands.
help:
Here are the available commands:
/start - Start the bot
/help - Show this help message
/set_language - Change your language
/set_settings - Update your preferences
/stop - Pause notifications
/delete_account - Remove your account
/about - Learn more about this bot
/set_address - Set your address
/set_distance - Set your search distance
/set_new_finder - Create a new finder
